segments.text: What should I do to prepare for a job interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: An understanding of the basic workings of a company and the services or goods it provides is essential . Do you have that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sort of , but I could know more , I guess .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: With that understanding , you can figure out what your company is looking for in terms of basic attitude . Right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that they are a very formal company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What you wear is important . So keep in mind what is suitable for the company and type of work you will be doing . Need help ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need a lot of help in this area .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In addition to clothes we need to think about other basics , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , what else should we think of ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be prompt . Don't forget to be friendly and interested . Listen carefully and listen to what they are really asking you . You'll be a hit !
segments.speaker: S2
